name: The Altar Beckons - LD47 entry
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 47! The theme was "Stuck in a loop".

It's an adventure game where you play a lil blue guy wandering through an underground temple! Gems and hairy monsters ahead.

This is my first game finished with Unity and I thank Ludum Dare for finally stepping up and make me complete a game. Feel like I learned more than last two months watching tutorials :V There are still some things I am not 100% satisfied, but I am proud that the game checked off all the specifications and designs I initially came up with.

Thanks for checking it out ya cool kids!
